about_the_game:
Run your own wonderful milk tea shop in "Milk Tea Time"! This is a simulation business game that can actually make milk tea, study custom recipes, and build a milk tea shop at will!

As the owner of a milk tea shop, you need to order for customers and make every cup of milk tea by hand to ensure that customers can enjoy the best quality drinks in the shortest time. Time is short, and your actions will determine the reputation of your store and customer satisfaction.

Stock up in advance, prepare for the day's business, and start business at your own pace.

Through continuous research and practice, we can unlock new formula of milk tea, meet customers' picky tastes, and make every cup of milk tea a unique work of art. There are lots of different ingredients to choose from to make your milk tea, fruit tea or coffee. And you will see your beautiful milk tea with your own eyes! Finally, you also need to play a fun R&D game to tap into the full potential of your milk tea.

Personally design and decorate your milk tea shop, from choosing the store layout to selecting the decorations, every step requires your unique vision and creativity. Let the store not only become a place for customers to taste delicious milk tea, but also become a warm space for them to relax and communicate.
